node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `recording` ( `recording_id` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `recording_of` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `appears_in` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `link` char(255) COLLATE utf8mb3_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `read_by` int NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`recording_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COLLATE=utf8mb3_unicode_ci
node.title: recording
